mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL

SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.IP_ADDR , M.NAME , M.NICK_NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL ORDER BY B.ID DESC

SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.IP_ADDR , M.NAME , M.NICK_NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON B.EMAIL = M.EMAIL WHERE B.ID = #{id}
